attributes.action: Keep gyms open during lockdown for everyone’s mental and physical health!
attributes.additional_details: The government or parliament have the power to look at the Covid numbers more closely the statistics show that less people have caught covid from going to their local gyms than any other social gathering places.
attributes.background: Keep the gyms open for everybody’s health and mental well being. Closing the gyms is only going to have a worst effect on the people whose only escape is the gym.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
